projects.title: Technovanza Event Website
projects.description: Developed the official Sympo-25 (Technovanza) event website using React and Vite, focusing on a modern, fast user interface. Implemented key event features, posters and an updated FAQ, along with a responsive background animation (using particles.js) for visual appeal.

projects.title: Rapture Twelve - Cybersecurity Website
projects.description: Designed and deployed the Rapture Twelve (R12) corporate website with a high-end, responsive frontend featuring a blue/black aesthetic and GSAP animations. Secured the site with a Node.js/Express.js backend API, implementing rate limiting and input validation for a production-ready contact form system.

projects.title: Parking App
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application using Flask and SQLite to manage vehicle parking for users and administrators. Implemented user authentication, parking lot CRUD operations, real-time reservation management, and admin dashboards with data visualizations.

projects.title: Kimai Cloud Migration Project
projects.description: Provisioned cloud infrastructure using Terraform with EC2, S3, IAM, and security groups. Automated deployment via Jenkins with Docker image builds and EC2 deployment. Secured & monitored the setup with a Bastion host, IAM roles, and CloudWatch logging.

projects.title: 3D Endless Runner
projects.description: Designed and implemented the 3D environment, including terrain and obstacles, using Unity, enhancing visual quality. Developed player mechanics (running, jumping, sliding) with C#, improving control responsiveness. Optimized game performance, increasing frame rates and reducing lag.

summary_points: Explored foundational principles of full stack development by collaborating on projects spanning both front-end and back-end technologies within cross-functional teams.
Assisted with the development and deployment of a project management dashboard by supporting sprint planning, tracking milestones, and facilitating communication among project stakeholders.
Supported DevOps engineering initiatives in cloud computing environments by integrating automated deployment pipelines, enhancing system reliability and scalability for project management solutions.
Developed a 2D game and a 3D endless runner, improving gameplay mechanics and coding efficiency, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement.
Collaborated with a team of 5 members to implement creative ideas, optimizing user experience and achieving a 15% reduction in gameplay bugs.
